sn1.35:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn1.35:1.2: Atha kho sambahula ujjhanasannika devatayo abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva vehasam atthamsu.
sn1.35:1.3: Vehasam thita kho eka devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
sn1.35:3.2: yam na kayira na tam vade;
sn1.35:6.1: Atha kho ta devatayo pathaviyam patitthahitva bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn1.35:6.2: “accayo no, bhante, accagama yathabalam yathamulham yathaakusalam, ya mayam bhagavantam asadetabbam amannimha.
sn1.35:6.3: Tasam no, bhante, bhagava accayam accayato patigganhatu ayatim samvaraya”ti.
sn1.35:6.5: Atha kho ta devatayo bhiyyoso mattaya ujjhayantiyo vehasam abbhugganchum.
sn1.35:6.6: Eka devata bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
